product_name: REI Lloro Rain Jacket - Girls' - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Lloro rain jacket offers comfort and reliable weather protection for a girl's rain-filled adventures. Polyester shell and nylon contrasting panels have REI Elements(R) polyurethane coating and factory-sealed seams to ensure waterproofness. Water-resistant zipper with full-length zipper guard helps seal out the elements. 3-panel hood with brim features elastic at sides and a rip-and-stick tab on back to adjust volume. Cuffs with rip-and-stick tabs adjust the fit and seal out rain; droptail hem with internal drawcord extends coverage in back. Features zippered hand pockets, chest pocket and internal mesh pocket with media port. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Lloro rain jacket offers comfort and reliable weather protection for a girl's rain-filled adventures.
